  • Field Details

    • rowsAffected

      public static int rowsAffected

  • Constructor Details

    • Restaurant

      public Restaurant(String name, String phoneNumber, String city)
      The constructor for the Restaurant class. It is not used but has been included for the sake of completeness.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the restaurant.
      phoneNumber - The contact number of the restaurant.
      city - The city in which the restaurant is located. This is important because it determines, together with workload, which driver will be allocated to the delivery.

  • Method Details

    • createNewRestaurant

      public static void createNewRestaurant(Connection connection, Scanner input) throws SQLException
      This method handles the creation of new restaurants to add to the database. It is invoked in the captureNewRestaurant method in the main class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      input - The Scanner instance from the main method needed here for the reading of user input with the help of the utility class UserInput.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findRestaurantId

      public static int findRestaurantId(Connection connection, String restaurantName) throws SQLException
      A method to find the restaurant's ID from the first name of the restaurant entered by the user. This method is used in the openOrder method in the Order class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method of the program, needed for the PreparedStatements.
      Returns:
      The restaurant's ID as an integer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findRestaurantName

      public static String findRestaurantName(Connection connection, int restaurantId) throws SQLException
      This method finds the restaurant name from the restaurant id entered by the user. It is invoked in the displayOrder and printInvoice methods in the Order class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      restaurantId - The unique id number of the restaurant.
      Returns:
      The name of the restaurant as a String.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findRestaurantLocation

      public static String findRestaurantLocation(Connection connection, String restaurantName) throws SQLException
      This method finds the restaurant location from the restaurant name. It is invoked in the addInitialOrderDetails and printInvoice methods in the Order class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      restaurantName - The restaurant name passed in as an argument when the method is invoked.
      Returns:
      The location of the restaurant as a String.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findRestaurantPhoneNumber

      public static String findRestaurantPhoneNumber(Connection connection, int restaurantId) throws SQLException
      A method to find the restaurant's phone number from its unique id number. It is invoked in printInvoice in the Order class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement
      restaurantId - The unique restaurant id number passed in as an argument.
      Returns:
      The restaurant phone number as a String.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • performFieldUpdate

      public static void performFieldUpdate(Connection connection, String fieldToUpdate, String newValue, int restaurantId) throws SQLException
      A generic method to update any field in the restaurant table except for the restaurant_id field which is fixed and unique. It is invoked in the updateRestaurant method in the main class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main menu needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      fieldToUpdate - The database name of the field to be updated passed in as an argument.
      newValue - The new value of the field. Passed in as an argument.
      restaurantId - The unique restaurant id number passed in as an argument.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.
